title: Does kindred still exist
body: Did kindred ever really exist or is it some weird dream i had?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=needHymn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f8zv1rEe,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-02-05T01:59:23.029+0000)
>
> Kindred is strong.

then why do i never see them
Yes, they got kind of irrelevant with the rise of tanks again, balance in general is strange right now and needs some time to recover from runes 2.0

Of course they do. They've just been flying under the radar for a long while.

I play still play them every so often :D
